title: Interpretation of winter in a dream - seeing winter in a dream

preview.html: Seeing winter and rain in a dream for single women, pregnant women, and divorced women, whether rain, snow, or cold, according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing winter in a dream. It is one of the dreams that indicates the goodness and happiness that the dreamer will soon obtain. Winter or rain in general in public life indicates the goodness that comes from the sky, which helps to germinate the earth and get rid of the germs present in the air. And other important matters that cause winter to end, just as Muslims turn when it rains to pray to God Almighty, as the gates of Paradise are open, as the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, recommended to us. To him, and we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing winter in a dream, as interpreted by the translator Ibn Sirin in his interpretations. Interpretation of winter in a dream If you see winter in a dream, this means bad health and gloomy signs of positive progress. After this dream, your efforts will not give satisfactory results. If you dream of winter in a dream when it is not winter, this indicates a slight loss for the dreamer due to illness. Rain and winter differ in their vision from their place and time, so that it is either a known place or over the whole country or part of it, and the time of its time. In the winter or summer dream in which it rains. Whoever sees that rain has fallen on the ground in general, then conditions will ease, he will find relief after hardship, and ease after distress. If they are expensive, prices will decrease, and if a ruler or official oppresses them, his injustice will go away and security and prosperity will prevail. If they are in sickness or illness, it will be taken from them, and God will protect them from what is stolen. Likewise, if they are poor, then they will become rich and prosperous. All this if the rain had covered the earth in its natural form without containing any elements of witness such as fire, dust, strong winds, or other than their season. But if it contains What indicates torment, rain and winter in a dream are interpreted as a multiplication of the situation they are in and an increase in hardships and torments such as illness, injustice, high cost, illness and poverty. The condition of the rain was in terms of strength, weakness, intensity, duration of time, or lack of time. Interpretation of winter in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing winter in a dream and the rain being relatively little, is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a lot of goodness and blessings in the near future. Also, the rain in the dream was not Strong, indicates that the dreamer will bring about positive changes in his work and public life. Seeing heavy rain in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer will face some problems and worries in the next stage and must be patient in the confrontation. Seeing torrents in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will face many difficult problems and major obstacles in his general life. Seeing rain falling in a dream, and this was at the beginning of the new year, Evidence that the dreamer will obtain a lot of goodness this year and his life will change for the better. Seeing winter in the patient’s dream is evidence that he will receive treatment soon, God willing. Also, seeing the dreamer performing ablution from rainwater in a dream to perform prayer is evidence that the dreamer is very close to God

title: Seeing the king in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin, and the interpretation of seeing the king’s wedding in a dream for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Seeing a king in a single woman’s dream is one of the most promising visions and has good connotations. The king is a symbol of power and influence in the country, but it can also be evidence of injustice and tyranny for an entire people or a large group of people, so sometimes it is good news and happiness, and sometimes it is a harbinger of danger or danger. An unpleasant event is about to happen. Seeing the king in a single woman’s dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the king in a single woman’s dream? Most commentators agree that this vision is a strong indicator of the successful achievement of goals and objectives and achieving superiority over colleagues. If you talk to the king in an engagement, this means She has reached a high level of intelligence, which qualifies her to work in international or foreign jobs. However, if she sits in front of the king, this indicates that she is on the right path and planning her life in the right way, which allows her to achieve her goals with ease. It also indicates the progress of a well-off young woman and a degree of beauty. For her engagement in the near future, which will be the reason for her happiness and the satisfaction of her desires in life. But if she sees the king coming to her house, this indicates that a happy event will soon happen in her house and she will be happy with all her family members. While she is the one who sees in her dream that the king is sick or He suffers from some health problems, so this indicates that she is doing some bad work in exchange for a lot of money and fame. If she sees the king dying, this indicates that she will be liberated from the restrictions and controls that stood in the way of her freedom and prevented her from achieving her goals in life. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin? For the king in an unmarried woman’s dream? Ibn Sirin states that this vision indicates success in life and achieving a high rank or achieving wide fame among people in one of the fields. Also, shaking hands with the king and talking to him expresses good personal traits and multiple skills, as she is tactful and good at speaking. With others. It also indicates that hearing happy news portends good signs for a distant person who was in love or an old relationship that ended some time ago, but he wanted to restore it. As for seeing the king facing a crisis in his state or headquarters, it expresses that he is facing a difficult problem that is difficult He has to find a suitable solution for her. Through Google, you can join us on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation and Visions website and you will find everything you do in it. Seeing King Salman in a dream for a single womanThis vision often indicates an important step towards the future, as it expresses the emergence of something that will Bringing about many changes in the dreamer’s life. It also indicates exposure to a difficult experience that requires the intervention of higher authorities to find a suitable solution, and perhaps there is a danger surrounding the visions that threatens her life. It is also one of the visions that express religiosity, good conditions, and following the teachings of religion when treating others, love. For the weak, and merciful. But if the king becomes angry, this may express reprehensible actions that offend the country and the people who do not adhere to authentic religious morals and customs. Seeing King Fahd in a dream for a single woman, this vision expresses her need for help in a specific matter or

As the vision of dry peas may indicate worries and God knows best. Also, if an unmarried girl sees a dry bean, it may lead to corruption, and God Almighty is over everything. When a married woman sees dry peas, it may lead to anxiety and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of seeing white beans in a dream Interpretation of a dream of seeing white peas in a dream Seeing peas can indicate strength and God knows best. While if the dreamer sees peas, it may be a sign of the strength that the dreamer has, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a pea, it may represent her strength and courage and God knows best. title: Interpretation of ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin - Seeing ants in a dream

preview.html: Ants - Interpretation of a dream about ants by Ibn Sirin: He is a soldier, and seeing them in bed is children, and a dream about ants shows the soul of the dreamer, and it is said that he appears to his relatives, and brings food out of his house, and he becomes poor. The emergence of ants from the nose, ear, or other organs indicates the death of the dreamer as a witness if he sees himself. He rejoices in his exit. If their production is bad, there is fear for him, and ants are a weak and willing person, and many of them are soldiers, offspring, owner, or for life. This place is a thing and there will be architecture because ants and architecture do not meet. The large number of ants in a country without harming anyone indicates the large number of people in the country. Interpretation of a dream about ants for Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about an ant: It is in a dream that a weak and willing person passes by soldiers and families. It indicates Fertility and food, because it is in a place where there is only food, and if the sick person sees ants crawling on his body, he will die. If the ants have wings, this indicates the destruction of many soldiers, and whoever sees ants entering his house with food, the goodness of his house will increase, and whoever sees ants taking his food out of His house is impoverished. And the emergence of ants from the nose, ear, or other organs, and he is satisfied with that, indicates the death of the dreamer as a witness, and whoever sees that he killed an ant has committed a sin because of a weak person. And whoever listens to the words of the ants and deserves the emirate will achieve it, otherwise he will achieve fertility and goodness. The great ants kill warriors and the sick to their death, and whoever wants to travel Their fatigue and loss.Interpretation of a dream about ants by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen’s interpretation of a dream about ants: It is interpreted in several ways: A large number of ants is interpreted by a large number of people. Ants come out of his house, indicating people leaving it in death or life, and whoever sees ants transporting something from his house, this is not good. And if he takes it home, it is different from him, and whoever sees ants coming out of his mouth or nose, then he is prepared for the ant’s destruction in a place where there is no He is accustomed to having a large number of ants, so he is not worthy of praise from the people of that place. In general, a dream about ants is interpreted in five ways: household members, relatives, sects, and money. Lose him. Imam Ali, may God be pleased with him, said in a poem about her: Be content with what remains without a tongue, for the Lord does not neglect an ant. If the time comes, rise, and if it moves away, sleep. for him. The scholar Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin explain that the appearance of ants in dreams and visions is evidence of the fortuneteller’s exaggeration, and when a person sees ants appearing on his clothes in a dream, this is clear evidence of the person’s elegance and keen interest. In the same.Seeing ants in a dreamIbn Sirin declared that it is good to see a dream about ants in a dream: Ants in a dream are weak and willing people, and whoever sees a lot of ants on a butterfly, he will have many children, and whoever sees ants flying, this indicates food and fertility. Because ants are only found in a place where they are abundant. Food. Whoever sees ants entering his house carrying food, then goodness will abound in his house. Whoever is worthy of the emirate and then listens to the words of the ants will gain the emirate, or obtain fruit and goodness, and the abundance of ants is interpreted as an abundance of money and a blessing or the Sultan’s soldiers. Whoever sees ants in food is affected by the increase in ants

title: What is the interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream: Dogs are a type of animal that is known to be loyal to its owner and is distinguished by its different types and colors, both local and wild, and is used in detecting crimes. What did the commentators say and what do their meanings carry, so follow us...! Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream If the dreamer sees dogs in a dream, then he will resort to enemies, and they have not shown any hostility, and he must be careful. In the event that the dreamer sees dogs in a dream, it symbolizes The presence of people who are greedy for them and trying to get close to them for an evil purpose. When the dreamer sees dogs in a dream, this symbolizes the presence of a greedy and greedy man and he must stay away from him. The fortune teller seeing wild dogs in a dream means people who have no morals and values. The dreamer seeing in a dream a crazy dog ​​symbolizes To the presence of a person who is a thief and he will be deprived of many important things. If a lady sees dogs being slaughtered in a dream, this means great ignorance and alienation of the mind. If the dreamer sees black dogs in the house in a dream, this indicates devils and jinn and they must be fortified. As for the dreamer who sees dogs In a dream and feeds it, it symbolizes the abundance of food and the goodness that comes to it. If the dreamer hears a dog barking violently in a dream, this means that he is suffering from an illness and a high temperature. And the dreamer who sees in a dream the dog’s saliva indicates the poisonous speech that she will hear in those days. Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing dogs in a dream indicates that the dreamer follows or promotes many sects in his life. Seeing dogs in a dream and attacking them means that weak enemies are surrounding them. Seeing large dogs in a dream shows foolish people. around him and the oppressors around him. Also, seeing dogs in a dream indicates that many sins and transgressions have been committed in the dreamer’s life and he must repent to God. If you see hunting dogs in your dream, this means happy circumstances and good events that you will be happy with. If a man sees In a dream, he gets rid of dogs, this means victory over enemies and overcoming their evil. If the dreamer sees dogs barking in a dream, this symbolizes being exposed to great betrayal by her partner. If the dreamer sees dogs in a dream and is not afraid of them, this indicates his strong personality that People know about it. Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees dogs in a dream, this means that haters and enemies surround her and she must be careful. If the dreamer sees a female dog in a dream, this symbolizes the presence of an evil friend in her life and she must She is worshipped. The dreamer who sees black dogs approaching her in a dream indicates that there is an evil person in her life who is deceiving her in the name of love. If the dreamer sees white dogs in a dream, this means that he will marry a good and righteous man. As for the dreamer who sees gray dogs in a dream, this indicates It means that he will fall into great harm or injustice. Seeing a red dog in a dream means that there is great danger that will surround him. If...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person sleeping in the bed of a living person and its meaning

preview.html: For the dead to sleep in the bed of the living in a dream. We often see in a dream death in its various forms, if the living person is close to insight, or one of the dead has already seen it and the person can see himself dead in a dream, and scholars have also explained that seeing death is a bad thing. In itself. But there are some other cases that bring with them goodness and the end of sorrows. Let us learn about the interpretation of seeing a dead person sleeping on the bed of a living person in a dream according to great interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin and Al. . - Al-Nabulsi. What is the interpretation of a dead person sleeping on a neighbor’s bed in a dream? When you see a deceased person speaking in general with insight and telling him about some events in the future, this may indicate his desire to send some messages to warn him, especially if he is going to implement a project or take the step of getting married or traveling. Outward. If the deceased smiles or hugs the visionary, this may indicate that he feels happy and that he lives quietly and wants to reassure his family and relatives of his condition, but if the deceased sees that the deceased is sleeping on his bed, this may be. It indicates that a person has died or is exposed to some crisis in the current period, whether it is a health crisis or a financial crisis. When embracing the deceased, a visionary, or a relative, it can mean that he enjoys health and longevity, and if he is in disagreement or enmity with someone, it can This indicates that this dispute will be resolved or that things will return to normal later. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type an Egyptian dream interpretation site.

title: Interpretation of seeing grapes in a dream: A bunch of grapes in a dream

preview.html: Seeing grapes for a single woman for a pregnant woman, a married woman, a divorced woman, a married woman, or a young man, whether black, green, or red, picked from a tree, buys sweet, sour, fresh, spoiled food. There are many on the authority of Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and al-Nabul. Interpretation of grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the grapes have a strong skin, this means that he obtains money through effort and effort. He said Al-Kirmani: Black grapes in their season are good, and may portend slight anxiety, and in addition to illness, sadness and fear in their season, white grapes in their season are praiseworthy, and at the end of their time there is sadness. Ibn Sirin said: White grapes in their season are interpreted by rain and dew, and eating them in Its season is evidence of what is permissible. And whoever sees that he ate white grapes in his time, then it is a blessing, goodness, benefit, and fulfillment of what he wished for, and if it was not in his time, and he sees this praise, then it is good. And money is permissible, and red grapes are equivalent. Whoever dreams that he buys grapes or juice will obtain goodness, and raisins of any color are good and beneficial to the one who eats them, and perhaps sour grapes are forbidden for money or illness. And whoever sees that he is picking a handful, he has taken a sum of money from the woman, and picked Grapes are an inheritance from his wife, and as for a single cluster, it is a thousand dirhams. And whoever sees grapes in a language other than Arabic, it is interpreted as bad money, so let the fortuneteller think about what he sees and what he says from his vision. If it is thin and its water is pure: it is an indication of lawful money, and every grape’s water changes. It contains forbidden money, and every red grape has honor and dignity, and every grape is sweeter and purer. It indicates an increase in benefit, money and price. And whoever sees black grapes hanging from his vine at the wrong time, it will be interpreted as extreme cold and fear, and perhaps it is money that the fortuneteller does not get. Eating communal grapes is evidence of the difficulty of earning money. The vineyard in the dream shows the woman because it is a good and sweet drink. Taste. He is the king of generosity and he was single and married. As for black grapes in their season, they are disliked, and some of them indicate illness or fear, and green grapes in their season show the juice of the world, its joys, and its gifts, and when there is no money. Which the fortuneteller receives before its expected date. Grape juice in a dream indicates what the dreamer will receive from a generous ruler or sultan. As for the bouquet, it indicates the amount of money. Whoever sees that he is taking it or collecting it, he will be affected by the money to the extent that he saw the grapes. And the bunch of grapes in The interpretation is one of the clear symbols that indicate money and its benefits. It was also said that if black grapes indicate money in the dream, then it is not permanent, and if a man sees it hanging, then it shows the woman. If the dreamer is a woman, then the cluster of grapes hanging from the vine indicates the husband. Some say Interpreters: Black grapes in a dream are not rejected, as God Almighty said in Surah Al-Nal: And from the fruits of palm trees and grapes you get sugar and good sustenance. And Zechariah found it with Mary, peace be upon her, because it is praiseworthy. It is said in the narratives that grapes were next to Noah’s son when his father called for him. Before that, it was white, and when it changed color, the grapes around it changed. Ibn Sirin says: If the fruit does not break every season and does not have time or substance to spoil, then it is good.

title: Interpretation of sardines in a dream: Seeing sardines in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of sardines in a dream for a single, married, or pregnant woman, whether she eats or buys raw, cleans, cooks, or fries in the oven or cans, etc., according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Abdullah. - Honest. Interpretation of a dream about sardines according to Miller’s Encyclopedia. Sardines are not good, and all kinds of fish are stored, such as herring and sardines. If you eat sardines in a dream, sad events will find you that you did not expect. If a girl dreams that she is putting sardines on the table, this means that she will be sad because of the intention of someone she does not like. Whoever sees sardines in a dream or tastes them indicates that he will face many shocks and difficulties in his social and personal life, but he will overcome them, overcome them all, and endure them forever. Fishing sardines in a dream has some interpretations, such as that the dreamer will be patient for a long time, but in the end He will obtain a valuable and great revolution. If you dream of seeing sardines, this indicates a crisis of financial confusion, but you will find success later. Interpretation of a dream of sardines in a dream: Whoever sees in her dream that she sees a large number of sardines and cannot calculate the amount of these fish, this means that the dreamer will get On a lot of money in the coming season because the fish represents food and money. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she sees a beautiful sardine and loves it, this indicates that she will soon be blessed with a good husband and he will be the best husband for her and the best bond. Sardines in a person’s dream symbolize great and widespread goodness. It indicates many blessings and great sustenance that will appear in the coming seasons. Whoever dreams that he is catching large sardines, this indicates that he will obtain a great livelihood and a good living in a short time. A small fish in a dream means little sustenance, and if she sees in her dream that the water is dirty and dirty. Clean, it means that her condition will change for the better in the coming days, but she must strive to achieve that and what she wants to succeed. Interpretation of sardines in a dream for a married woman. Whoever sees in her dream that she is catching a type of fish and its color is brown, this indicates that God Almighty will provide her husband with a trade. It is beneficial and he will earn a lot of money through it. A married woman who sees a fish without scales in her dream indicates that she will be exposed to some deception by a person she will meet soon, but she will make the right decision and stay away from him. A married woman who sees in her dream that she sees clear water and sees sardines in The bottom of the sea, this indicates that the dreamer will obtain a wish that he previously desired and God will grant it to him. The sardines found on the bed indicate that the dreamer will be affected by the disease, but he will soon recover from this disease within a short period of time. And whoever sees in a dream that he is fishing, and the water is pure and pure, This indicates that God provides him with abundant goodness. Seeing sardines in a pregnant woman’s dream. Anyone who is pregnant and dreams in her dream that she is eating sardines, this indicates that her health and the health of her fetus will improve from what it is now. As for the pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is fishing and chasing large sardines, This indicates that she will give birth to a child

title: Interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing snakes in general is considered one of the ugliest and most annoying things, so knowing the interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream becomes one of the most important interpretations for which we must find some interpretations and clues that may interest the dreamer. This is because snakes are considered wild and poisonous things that negatively affect our lives. In fact, hence seeing them in a dream can have a great significance for some things that we do not know or ignore. In most cases, seeing snakes in a dream can mean a warning of something bad, because snakes are among the most harmful and venomous animals ever. Interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. The great scholar Ibn Shaheen believes that in the interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream, there are some important clues, which we will learn through the site. Various, which consist of the following: He says that this vision has something to do with the enemy’s cunning and deception. As for who In his dream he saw a live snake in his house, this is evidence that his enemy may be a stranger. And whoever sees that he is killing the snake, with this vision he will defeat his enemy. And whoever sees that he is killing the snake, raising it with his hand and distributing it, then he will defeat the enemies and take money from them. As for the one who dreams that snakes are talking to him With good and kind words, this indicates goodness and benefit. And whoever sees that the snake obeys him while working on it, then this vision in him is an indication of the attainment of glory, prestige and grace. Whoever sees a snake made of metal, then this vision is good, and if it is made of gold or gold, then this is better. And stronger. Interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream that it indicates an increase in the number of envious, spiteful, and evil people in the dreamer’s life. As for the snakes that appear in the dream, which are long and huge, this vision shows the strength of the people who hate and persecute this dreamer. In fact, as for the dreamer’s vision of snakes that contain many colors, this vision shows the ugliness in the behavior of this dreamer’s enemies, as they are hypocritical and evil and have many bad qualities. But if the dreamer sees many snakes in his dream and buries them all, then this vision shows the power of that. The dreamer believes that he will be able to control his enemies and that he will be able to prevent them from harming or hurting him. Anyone on his side. Interpretation of one vision of many snakes: An unmarried girl, when she sees many snakes in a dark room, this vision shows that she is suffering from many corrupt people and haters in her life, and if she sees in the same dream that she escaped from this room peacefully, this indicates that The safety and protection that this girl gets. But if an unmarried woman sees that she killed all the poisonous snakes that appeared to her in a dream, this indicates that she will pass a bad stage in her life, and that she will triumph over her enemies. And if she sees that she was able to escape from the snakes in The dream indicates that she will be saved from the cruelty of all the enemies around her and they will not be able to harm her. Interpretation of a married woman who sees snakes in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing loose teeth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out for a pregnant woman: A dream about teeth falling out in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the stress and anxiety she feels about the loss of the fetus. However, if she sees in a dream that her husband’s teeth are falling out, this is evidence of disagreements and family problems between the two partners. Also, seeing my children falling out in a dream indicates a situation Poor academics or academics and lack of interest in school work. Seeing the upper molar falling out in a dream indicates a disturbance in the connection of the womb with the new moon. Seeing the point falling of the upper layer. For a woman, the lower molar means a man in a dream. Seeing a tooth falling out in a dream means the death of a family member or friend. In a way In general, losing a particle means experiencing financial loss or a deterioration in the work situation. Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dream for a single woman: The tooth is present in the dream of an unmarried girl, this indicates dignity and self-respect. But if she sees in a dream that her teeth are shaking, this is evidence that she is going through sadness and a heavy stage. Difficult, and a bad psychological state. Teeth tremble in a single girl’s dream of the presence of a man in her life, but she does not respond to him with the same confidence in him and is afraid that he will leave her. Teeth tremble in the dream of an unmarried girl, who feels anxious, confused, and tense in thinking about the issues of her life. The vision indicates fluctuation in The psychological state of a girl who is going through a difficult period, and feels short and in a bad psychological state. But if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that the lower teeth are loose, this indicates the woman or the family, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. The girl’s raised lower teeth indicate sadness and a feeling of care in her life. Interpretation of a dream about removing a wisdom tooth in a dream: The teeth that fall out in the dream, especially the upper ones, indicate the money that the dreamer will obtain, and God knows best. If the teeth fall into his lap, this indicates a male child, but if they fall to the ground, it means losing one of the parents through his death. The vision also shows intelligence. The priest and his cunning, lack of wisdom, i.e. useless talk. After losing teeth in a dream, this indicates an increase in the number of children and good offspring. The dream indicates happy complexion with the birth of a new and born child in the family. Where do wisdom teeth appear in a dream, this may indicate traveling to another place And profit in the field of work and increased abundant sustenance. Interpretation of a dream about long teeth in a dream: Seeing a dream that the teeth have become longer indicates a praiseworthy and noble vision in the dreamer’s life. While small teeth, their good meaning is form, but the long meaning in the dream for the dreamer is one of the good visions. Interpretation Dreaming of teeth falling out of the hand in a dream. Teeth falling out in a dream for the dreamer indicates breakage and exposure to financial or practical loss, as well as to the heart or emotions. As for cleaning teeth from caries, it means that money comes illegally. White teeth in a dream and falling into the palm of your hand indicates that you honor someone. And God knows best. Dirty and full of decay in a dream indicates illicit money. If teeth fall out in the hand and they are clean and white, this indicates...
